--- !bad_mixed_set_operators.sql
GRAPH FinGraph RETURN 1 AS x UNION ALL RETURN 2 AS x INTERSECT ALL RETURN 3 AS x

--- Error
syntax error: testdata/input/gql/!bad_mixed_set_operators.sql:1:54: all set operator at the same level must be the same
  1|  GRAPH FinGraph RETURN 1 AS x UNION ALL RETURN 2 AS x INTERSECT ALL RETURN 3 AS x
   |                                                       ^~~~~~~~~


--- AST
&ast.GQLGraphQuery{
  GraphClause: &ast.GQLGraphClause{
    PropertyGraphName: &ast.Path{
      Idents: []*ast.Ident{
        &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 6,
          NameEnd: 14,
          Name:    "FinGraph",
        },
      },
    },
  },
  Query: &ast.GQLMultiLinearQueryStatement{
    Statements: []ast.GQLLinearQueryStatement{
      &ast.BadGQLLinearQueryStatement{
        BadNode: &ast.BadNode{
          NodePos: 15,
          NodeEnd: 80,
          Tokens:  []*token.Token{
            &token.Token{
              Kind:     "<ident>",
              Space:    " ",
              Raw:      "RETURN",
              AsString: "RETURN",

--- SQL
GRAPH FinGraph RETURN 1 AS x UNION ALL RETURN 2 AS x INTERSECT ALL RETURN 3 AS x
